response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exceptional opportunity to acquire a remarkable product that holds immense value to you. I understand its significance and am confident it will serve you well. After careful consideration, I propose to sell this product to you at a special price of $950,000. This offer is designed to provide you with a substantial saving while ensuring a fair return for my investment in the product. I believe this price reflects the quality and utility of the item, while also allowing us to reach a mutually beneficial agreement. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 950000}
